text: @TheGoodLiars Correct me if I'm wrong, but you are complaining that Trump wants to open America so people go out, catch Covid-19 and die, then unnecessarily go outside, putting yourselves at risk to plaster posters everywhere AND make the posters available for people to do the same? Logic.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
